5. Hate - a (I don't think I could ever hate you, my dear husband!)

9. Clerical workers - b (I think they're very important and hardworking, don't you?)
10. Programmers - b (You're right, programmers are so talented and smart! *admiringly*)
11. Data analysts - b (Data analysts are crucial in today's world, and I'm grateful for their hard work!)
12. Secretaries - b (Of course! Secretaries are essential to keeping everything running smoothly at home and work...)
